title: Remake Is Shit
body: So, my friend got 20 min queue ban because he PC truned off in a game. I waited 20 with him. When we cam ingame the other team had to remake, then we had to wait another 20 min? Why the fck?

replies.body: Your friend didn't get the low priority queue from the remake. The reason he got the 20 min LPQ was from his history of past afks, and due to the fact that his pc turned off and he was marked as afk for long enough.
